instructions:
Excel row names are in the following format:

A, B, ..., Z, AA, ..., AZ, BA, ..., ZZ, AAA, AAB, ...

Write a function that returns the row number from the row name.

Examples

row("A") ➞ 1

row("Z") ➞ 26

row("AA") ➞ 27

row("BA") ➞ 53

Notes

N/A
tests:
Test.assertEquals(row("A"), 1)
Test.assertEquals(row("B"), 2)
Test.assertEquals(row("Z"), 26)
Test.assertEquals(row("AA"), 27)
Test.assertEquals(row("BA"), 53)
Test.assertEquals(row("BB"), 54)
Test.assertEquals(row("CW"), 101)
Test.assertEquals(row("DD"), 108)
Test.assertEquals(row("PQ"), 433)
Test.assertEquals(row("ZZ"), 702)
Test.assertEquals(row("ABC"), 731)
Test.assertEquals(row("ZZT"), 18272)
Test.assertEquals(row("STVW"), 348059)
title: Get the Excel Row
